activities: We provide, among other things, alters and notification in the form for email and/or SMS messages regarding the status of subscriber assets (yachts) and the workflow of tasks assigned.  If provided, the personal data is used for communication of system events, alerts and notifications.  Managers manage the receipt of these messages for their staff, the clients of our clients have the option to opt in or out of all messages via their profile.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, contact info, vessel info and maintenance data, geolocalization of vessels (60 day historical)
